DataElement.preferredName: Right Lower Extremity Specified Centimeter Distance Second Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Second measurement of a clearly and explicitly stated space measured in centimeters between two objects or points on the right limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Right Lower Extremity Specified Centimeter Distance
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The clearly and explicitly stated space measured in centimeters between two objects or points on the right limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.:Definition not available.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specified; clearly and explicitly stated.:A centimeter is a basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.:The space between two objects or points.

Concepts.definition: A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.
The space separating two objects or points.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for LEVENTHM by script Thu Aug 1 14:43:02 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard, coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude, of a limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
